DOC.brief_summary: Open-label , randomize study NESP pediatric subject 18 year age young . Subjects receive study drug ( NESP rHuEPO ) 28 week 2 week screen baseline period . During study , procedure include bloodwork laboratory assessment vital sign . Dose titration determine hemoglobin value take weekly study . Antibody sample take baseline end study assessment . A physical examination laboratory test conclude study .
